alert.note: Alert for Coahoma; DeSoto; Marshall; Panola; Quitman; Tate; Tunica (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Tornado Watch issued March 31 at 5:58PM CDT until March 31 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: TORNADO WATCH 94 REMAINS VALID UNTIL 8 PM CDT THIS EVENING FOR THE FOLLOWING AREAS IN ARKANSAS THIS WATCH INCLUDES 10 COUNTIES IN EAST ARKANSAS CLAY CRAIGHEAD CRITTENDEN CROSS GREENE LEE MISSISSIPPI PHILLIPS POINSETT ST. FRANCIS IN MISSISSIPPI THIS WATCH INCLUDES 7 COUNTIES IN NORTH MISSISSIPPI COAHOMA DESOTO MARSHALL PANOLA QUITMAN TATE TUNICA IN MISSOURI THIS WATCH INCLUDES 2 COUNTIES IN SOUTHEAST MISSOURI DUNKLIN PEMISCOT IN TENNESSEE THIS WATCH INCLUDES 11 COUNTIES IN WEST TENNESSEE CROCKETT DYER FAYETTE GIBSON HAYWOOD LAKE LAUDERDALE OBION SHELBY TIPTON WEAKLEY THIS INCLUDES THE CITIES OF ALAMO, BARTLETT, BATESVILLE, BLYTHEVILLE, BROWNSVILLE, CARUTHERSVILLE, CLARKSDALE, COLLIERVILLE, CORNING, COVINGTON, DRESDEN, DYERSBURG, FORREST CITY, GERMANTOWN, HARRISBURG, HELENA, HOLLY SPRINGS, HUMBOLDT, JONESBORO, KENNETT, MARIANNA, MARKS, MARTIN, MEMPHIS, MILAN, MILLINGTON, OAKLAND, OLIVE BRANCH, PARAGOULD, PIGGOTT, RIPLEY TN, SENATOBIA, SOMERVILLE, SOUTHAVEN, TIPTONVILLE, TUNICA, UNION CITY, WEST HELENA, WEST MEMPHIS, AND WYNNE.

area.areaDesc: Coahoma; DeSoto; Marshall; Panola; Quitman; Tate; Tunica
